data.name: Area Status
data.description: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers `(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)`.

data.name: Curse
data.description: (*ϟ*) The target suffers `(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)`.

data.name: Curse XL
data.description: (*ϟ*) The target suffers `(choose two: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)`.

data.name: Cursed Breath
data.description: (*ϟ*) The target suffers`【HR + 15】(choose type)` damage and suffers `(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)`.

data.name: Devastation
data.description:
You deal 30 `(choose type)` damage to every enemy you can see. You may only cast this spell `once per turn`.
This spell should only be given to `champion` and `elite` creatures `level 30 or higher`, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their `last turn in the round`.

data.name: Lick Wounds
data.description: You recover 20 Hit Points. This amount increases to 30 Hit Points if you are `level 20 or higher`, to 40 Hit Points if you are `level 40 or higher`, or to 50 Hit Points if you are `level 60 or higher`.

data.name: Life Theft
data.description: (*ϟ*) The target suffers`【HR + 15】(choose type)` damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.

data.name: Mind Theft
data.description: (*ϟ*) The target suffers`【HR + 15】(choose type)` damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.

data.name: Poison
data.info: 10 MP x T - Up to three creatures - Instantaneous
data.description: Each target hit by this spell suffers `poisoned`.

data.name: Quicken
data.description: The target may immediately perform a `free attack` with a weapon they have equipped (or with a `basic attack`, if the target is an NPC).

data.name: Rage
data.info: 10 MP x T - Up to three - Scene
data.description: (*ϟ*) Each target hit by this spell suffers `enraged`.

data.name: War Cry
data.info: 10 MP × T - Up to three creatures - Scene
data.description: Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.

data.name: Weaken
data.description: (*ϟ*) Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal `(choose type)` damage.
